attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For everyone who thinks that he is a showboater and falls over whenever someone comes within a  300 metre radius of his hair. This problem could be solved if we shaved his head whether he likes it or not! Everyone would be happier and start to enjoy watching football. No-one really likes his hair as it looks greasy and plastic.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
